ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Status)), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Approved"),ISPICKVAL(Status, "Submitted")), NOT(OR($Profile.Name = "System Administrator",$Profile.Name = "Data Load API Only",$Profile.Name ="System Admin API Only",$Profile.Name ="GDMFSL FSA")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The current Time Sheet Entry status doesnÂ´t allow modification to its entries.
